name: Alien Hunter Utsuho
description:
Help Utsuho fend off an alien invasion summoned in Gensokyo by yet another Moriya Shrine conspiracy in this top down puzzle game ! Plan your moves carefully to align all the aliens and eliminate them in one Giga Flare ! (*may contain B movie monsters, nuclear deathrays and smooth jazz ) 

The game is in an embryonic state, but more levels and features might be added depending on whim and fate.

Alien_Hunter_Utsuho.zip is the Jam submission

Alien_Hunter_Utsuho_Post-jam.zip is an iteration of the above (with bug fixes), uploaded around 3 hours after the jam cutoff time.

Credits:

Programming: Weakest Imp, kurantoB
Design, Art: Poire_a_Doxe, GeneralFefnirski
Music: Kronington
